[broadcom]
/vendor/bin/hw/wpa_supplicant
-O/data/vendor/wifi/wpa/sockets
-puse_p2p_group_interface=1
-g@android:wpa_wlan0

[realtek]
/vendor/bin/hw/wpa_supplicant
-O/data/vendor/wifi/wpa/sockets
-g@android:wpa_wlan0

[ssv]
/vendor/bin/hw/wpa_supplicant
-O/data/vendor/wifi/wpa/sockets
-g@android:wpa_wlan0

[esp]
/vendor/bin/hw/wpa_supplicant
-O/data/vendor/wifi/wpa/sockets
-puse_p2p_group_interface=1
-g@android:wpa_wlan0

[mvl]
/vendor/bin/hw/wpa_supplicant
-O/data/vendor/wifi/wpa/sockets
-g@android:wpa_wlan0
